name: System Developer at Nepa Sweden
description: Development and operations of systems that enabled colleagues to deliver insights and research results to their customers. The systems were mostly .Net Core back end systems with webApis and fronts hosted in Google. Using Docker containers, Kubernetes and GCP. Participated in pair- and mobprogramming sessions. Overviewed monitoring systems and troubleshoot alerts and error messages as well as brainstormed with the team for an idea of how to solve the problem.

name: Junior Software Developer at Craft Academy
description: CraftAcademy's Full Stack Web Development Coding Bootcamp, including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Ruby, Rails and more. Focused on teaching devs to utilize a test-driven approach to development, using tools such as RSpec, Node, Cucumber and Cypress.

description: Responsible for the organisation, risk prevention and medical assistance for the patient at the assigned place of work.
